title: ‘Étoile’ Review: Luke Kirby and Charlotte Gainsbourg Anchor Amy Sherman-Palladino’s Grand Dance Drama
content: Since The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel ended its 22-time Emmy-winning run in 2023, TV series have been awfully short on temperamental artists, fast-talking New Yorkers and whip-smart female characters. The … [+3872 chars]
